games.title: Leap and Avoid 2
games.description: Test your reflexes and timing in this challenging platformer game. Jump over obstacles and avoid traps to reach the finish line.
games.instructions: Use arrow keys or WASD to move. Press Space to jump.

games.title: Switch
games.description: Switch between different modes to overcome obstacles in this addictive puzzle game. Time your moves perfectly to progress.
games.instructions: Click to switch colors and navigate through obstacles.

games.title: Zombie Space Episode 2
games.description: Fight off hordes of space zombies in this action-packed shooter. Upgrade your weapons and survive as long as possible.
games.instructions: WASD to move, Mouse to aim and shoot.

games.title: Ragdoll Archers
games.description: Test your archery skills in this physics-based game. Hit targets and defeat opponents with your bow and arrow.
games.instructions: Click and drag to aim, release to shoot arrows.

games.title: Dead Seek
games.description: Survive in a post-apocalyptic world filled with zombies. Scavenge for resources and fight to stay alive.
games.instructions: WASD to move, E to interact, Mouse to aim and shoot.

games.title: The Frame Pixel Art
games.description: Create beautiful pixel art in this relaxing creativity game. Choose from various colors and tools to express yourself.
games.instructions: Click to place pixels, use toolbar to select colors and tools.

games.title: Snake.io
games.description: Grow your snake by eating food and defeating other players in this multiplayer io game. Can you become the biggest?
games.instructions: Use arrow keys or mouse to control your snake. Eat food to grow longer.

games.title: Void Scrappers
games.description: Pilot your spaceship through dangerous asteroid fields while collecting resources. Upgrade your ship and discover new areas.
games.instructions: Use arrow keys to navigate, Space to boost, Z to collect resources.

games.title: Soul Grinder
games.description: Battle hordes of enemies in this dark fantasy action game. Collect souls to upgrade your abilities and defeat powerful bosses.
games.instructions: WASD to move, Mouse to aim, Left-click to attack, Right-click for special ability.

games.title: Stabfish.io
games.description: Stab other fish and grow larger in this multiplayer underwater battle game. Dodge attacks and become the king of the ocean.
games.instructions: Move mouse to control your fish, click to dash and stab.

games.title: Paper Knight Quest: The Cube World
games.description: Embark on an epic adventure in a paper craft world. Solve puzzles, defeat enemies, and save the kingdom.
games.instructions: Arrow keys to move, Z to attack, X to interact, C to use special ability.

games.title: Kingdom of Pixels
games.description: Build and manage your own pixel kingdom in this strategy game. Gather resources, train troops, and expand your territory.
games.instructions: Click to select buildings and units, drag to move units.

games.title: Doodle Road
games.description: Guide your car along a hand-drawn road in this endless driving game. Avoid obstacles and collect coins to unlock new vehicles.
games.instructions: Use arrow keys or tap left/right sides of screen to control the car.

games.title: Miner's Fury
games.description: Dig deep underground to find precious gems and minerals. Upgrade your equipment and discover hidden treasures.
games.instructions: WASD to move, Mouse to aim, Left-click to mine.

games.title: Crazy Miners Multiplayer
games.description: Compete with other players to mine the most resources in this multiplayer mining game. Sabotage opponents and claim the best mining spots.
games.instructions: WASD to move, Mouse to aim, Left-click to mine, Right-click to place items.

games.title: Tower Swap
games.description: Match colorful blocks to clear levels in this addictive puzzle game. Plan your moves carefully to achieve the highest score.
games.instructions: Click on blocks to select them, then click again to swap with adjacent blocks.

games.title: Heroes Assemble
games.description: Form a team of superheroes to battle evil villains. Each hero has unique abilities that can be combined for powerful attacks.
games.instructions: Click to select heroes, drag to move them, right-click to use special abilities.

games.title: Iron Towers Alliance
games.description: Defend your base from waves of enemies in this tower defense game. Build and upgrade towers with different abilities.
games.instructions: Click to select and place towers, right-click to upgrade towers.

games.title: Crazy Dummy Swing Multiplayer
games.description: Swing your ragdoll character to victory in this physics-based multiplayer game. Avoid obstacles and reach the finish line first.
games.instructions: Use arrow keys or WASD to move, Space to jump, Mouse to aim and swing.

games.title: Rhythm Capture
games.description: Test your rhythm skills in this music-based game. Hit the notes at the right time to capture the beat and score points.
games.instructions: Press the keys shown on screen at the right time to hit the notes.

games.title: Man Runner 2048
games.description: Run and merge numbers to reach 2048 in this unique combination of endless runner and puzzle game. Dodge obstacles while collecting matching numbers.
games.instructions: Use arrow keys or swipe to move left/right and merge numbers.

games.title: Funny Nose Surgery
games.description: Play as a nose surgeon in this humorous simulation game. Perform various procedures to help patients with their nose problems.
games.instructions: Follow the on-screen instructions to perform surgery using mouse clicks and drags.

categories.name: Action
categories.description: Fast-paced games that test your reflexes and skills. Our action games collection includes shooters, fighting games, and more.

categories.name: Puzzle
categories.description: Challenge your brain with our collection of puzzle games. From matching games to logic puzzles, find the perfect mental challenge.

categories.name: Strategy
categories.description: Plan, think, and conquer in our strategy games collection. Test your tactical skills and strategic thinking abilities.

categories.name: Sports
categories.description: Enjoy virtual sports action with our sports games collection. Play football, basketball, racing, and more.

categories.name: Adventure
categories.description: Embark on exciting journeys and epic quests in our adventure games collection. Explore new worlds and uncover hidden treasures.

categories.name: Racing
categories.description: Feel the speed and excitement in our racing games collection. Drive fast cars, bikes, and other vehicles in thrilling competitions.

categories.name: Multiplayer
categories.description: Compete or cooperate with other players in our multiplayer games collection. Test your skills against real opponents from around the world.

categories.name: Music
categories.description: Feel the rhythm in our music games collection. Test your timing and enjoy catchy tunes in these interactive musical experiences.

categories.name: Simulation
categories.description: Experience different roles and situations in our simulation games. From managing cities to performing surgery, these games let you try new things.

categories.name: Popular Games
categories.description: The most played games on Arcade Haven. These fan favorites are played by thousands of gamers every day.

categories.name: New Games
categories.description: Our newest additions to Arcade Haven. Check back regularly to discover fresh gaming experiences.
